com.linkedin.cubert.block

Interface BlockWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroBlockWriter, RubixBlockWriter, ShuffleBlockWriter, TextBlockWriter

    public interface BlockWriter
    An object that writes a Block. This object is used to write the block both at the mapper and the reducer.
